Race.SpecificTitle: PW Law Enforcement Dist. -- 10.18 Mills - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Law Enforcement District Proposition
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 10.18 mills property tax continuation for providing additional funding for the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Caldwell.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a ten and eighteen hundredths (10.18) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $388,851.64 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2010 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?
